abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Highway Project Liberia was
            achieved. The overall performance of the Ministry of Public
            Works (MPW) in the execution of the Third Highway Project
            can be regarded as satisfactory. There is some evidence,
            though that more could have been achieved had MPW invoked
            its experiences acquired from execution of the first two
            highway projects. Even though all components of the project
            have been completed, the Government of Liberia is still
            exploring means of liquidating its financial indebtedness to
            the various contractors and consultants that provided
            construction and construction management services
            respectively. The conclusion is that all components of the
            Third Highway Project are economically justified and
            socially desirable.
